caption.center: Appeal of Violet Shreffler, Venango County Children and Youth Services,

opinion.posture: Civil proceedings. Custody. Before BREENE, J. No. 193 Pittsburgh 1981. Appeal from the order of the Court of Common Pleas of Venango County, Civil Division, No. 2 ofPage 519 1981.
opinion.attorneys: David M. Axinn, for appellant; Walter Bloom, District Attorney, for appellee and participating party.
opinion.panel: Before CAVANAUGH, MONTEMURO and VAN der VOORT, JJ.
